projects.name: Studynotion
projects.content:
Developed features such as dedicated dashboards for students and instructors, cart management, and OTP validation via email. 
Integrated Razorpay for seamless payment transactions, Cloudinary to manage media assets ensuring efficient storage and retrieval, Gmail for mail services to mitigate fraudulent user registrations.

projects.name: PlaynWins
projects.content: Designed an intuitive interface to facilitate seamless navigation and enhance user experience. Developed an admin dashboard for efficient management and quick access. Implemented session-based login using JWT and stored hashed passwords to ensure data protection and security.

work: Designed and implemented scalable RESTful APIs using Django REST Framework, enabling seamless integration with Next.js frontend for dynamic and responsive web applications.
Developed SEO-optimized web applications using Next.js, leveraging SSR and SSG to improve page load speed by 30% and enhance user experience.
Built and maintained backend systems using Django, ensuring robust database management, security, and efficient API performance for full-stack applications.
Built 10+ responsive UIs using React.js and Redux, boosting user engagement by 25%.
Integrated RESTful APIs, payment gateways, and AWS S3 for media storage, cutting data load times by 15%.
Delivered pixel-perfect UIs using Tailwind CSS with reusable components, improving development efficiency.
